name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install concurrently --legacy-peer-deps && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.install:angular: npm install -g @angular/cli@16.2.0 && cd frontend && npm install @angular-devkit/build-angular@16.2.0 --save-dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build -- --configuration production
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
